I realize you have plenty of subjective anecdotal evidence.I don't consider=
 that 'hard evidence' however.=C2=A0 I am looking for something a little mo=
re objective and less subject to influence and interpretations.

And stop p=
utting words in my mouth. A person can misinterpret something, mistake some=
thing, or confuse something, without lying about something.=C2=A0 And befor=
e you jump down my throat claiming I am saying all results are mistakes, I =
am not.=C2=A0 I am performing experiments, keeping an open mind, and consid=
ering all evidence I find. 

The way you have been attacking me by calling =
me names at every turn, just because I try new things and don't always agre=
e with your world view, is eerily reminiscent of the way the church of old =
tried to suppress new thought and discoveries, except you're just substitut=
ing the word 'heretic' with 'science'. and 'blasphemy' with anything that d=
isagrees with you.

There's an old saying:=C2=A0 "We become that which we h=
ate".=C2=A0 So far, all you've done is denounce people's efforts to try new=
 methods and see what works.=C2=A0 You accept nothing anyone else proposes =
if it does not agree with you.=C2=A0 That is the realm of the extreme skept=
ic: the same skeptic you ridicule.
=C2=A0
You certainly don't have to agree=
 with my comments.=C2=A0 And I don't have to agree with yours.=C2=A0 But no=
 one needs all the name calling Frank.=C2=A0=C2=A0 It really adds nothing t=
o support your theories.

      =C2=A0Y=
eah I know, science no accept anecdotes. There is plenty of hard evidence, =
trouble, science don't accept that either cuz they are taught, no spirits, =
so there are no sprit voices, fact is fact is facts. Well that's about all =
there is in this field. Perhaps you should take bird watching or something =
concrete. To not accept what others say is the same as calling us all liars=
, and I find very insulting. 

=C2=A0
=C2=A0How irrational is it to ignore =
all evidence and continuously try to fit the phenomon into a diffintion whe=
re it will not fit and does not belong, and then claim you're looking for a=
 more rational explantation, it just does not make sense. I say forget the =
BS "science" whatever that is, puts out and try thinking on your own.=C2=A0=
 Mr Spock was a fictional charactor!

=C2=A0
=C2=A0F-S

=C2=A0 





I don't think I have enough data yet to make any conclusions,=
 so I plan more experiments.=C2=A0 Since there are different distinct claim=
s about what the box or the recorders can do, I try to make different disti=
nct experiments for each.


Some people claim they can get the box to tell =
them things that the operator couldn't know, so my "whats the object" exper=
iment is one way to examine that.=C2=A0 Some people claim the boxes can mak=
e predictions, so cataloging predictions and examining the results can help=
 examine that.=C2=A0 If there are other claims, I will try to figure experi=
ments based on those.

=
=C2=A0
=C2=A0Yeah, I think I was too hard on RJ. I don't know why, but test=

Here is a short file, where someone says, "Scamp, Scamp=
," then Scamp barks. "yap."=C2=A0 This little dog belonged to my grandma, w=
hen I was about 9 or 10 years old, he was a Manchester Terrier, and lived w=
ith us for many years, and this is his bark for sure.=C2=A0 I'd know that b=
ark anywhere.=C2=A0 Sorry, that I can't make it any clearer, I need to get =
one of those better ghost boxes I guess.=C2=A0=C2=A0RJ, spirits are just li=
ke us, they are not omnipresent like God,=C2=A0=C2=A0probably why David doe=
sn't want to play the guessing game, he has better things to do over there,=
 and has said, they have thousands of people standing in this long line wai=
ting to get into the Heavens, and He can't just drop His job and go to your=
 house to see what you have over there, He did tell me that first time what=
 it was, and i sent it to you, but it was too late.=C2=A0 It's hard for me =
to understand them sometimes, He was also right about that little boy, Syle=
r being killed, and where his body would be
 found, I don't know what they =
did about it though. sf
